title: The sword of Christian magistracy supported, or, A vindication of the Christian magistrates authority under the Gospell, to punish idolatry, apostacy, heresie, blasphemy, and obstinate schism, with corporall, and in some cases with capitall punishments ... by William Prinne of Lincolns Inne, Esquire.
author: Prynne, William, 1600-1669.
publisher: Printed by R.I. for John Bellamy, and are to be sold at his shop ...,
